A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 31, 2010''', at 22:41 UTC, to fix a bug from the [[Java Edition Indev 0.31 20100131-2156|previous version]].

== Fixes ==
'''1 issue fixed'''
*Fixed the "Back to game" button not working.<ref>IRC logs: "[17:39] <Lexi> Notch: to repeat - when loading a level you can't close the menu with the back to game button"..."[17:39] <Notch> fixing.."..."[17:41] <Notch> loading works better now. =)"</ref>
